name: Treasure of the Chrono King
description:
You are asked by the Quartz Corps to unearth the treasure deep inside the forbidden Temple of the Chrono King. You must fight your way to the treasure at the bottom of the temple while mining gems and fighting enemies that wish to stop you in your tracks.

Time Manipulation Mechanic - Time only moves when you do. The difference though is that based on their color, enemies and objects in the world will move either with or against time. Green enemies & objects move when you do. Red enemies & objects move when you're still. There are others explained further in the game's how-to section.

CONTROLS

Arrow Keys - move

Z - accept, mine gems, interact

X - back, shoot bow, cancel

Escape - open/close map
